name: AAXA KP10002M P2 Jr Pico Projector Pocket Size

reviews.name: AAXA P2 Jr. Pico Projector, 55 Lumens, Pocket Size, Li-Ion Battery, HDMI, Media Player, 15,000 Hour LED, DLP Projector
reviews.reviewText:
Projectors have come a long way. This projector is so small compared to the gigantic sized regular sized projector. Cool gift for my techie friend. He thought it was sweet.
Only thing is, gotta make sure the environment is dark, really dark. Which it will mostly be because you'll be using this little guy to watch movies. I like that this guy is really portable and battery too if necessary, but I usually leave it plugged in anyways.
reviews.title: A surprising Projector

reviews.name: AAXA P2 Jr. Pico Projector, 55 Lumens, Pocket Size, Li-Ion Battery, HDMI, Media Player, 15,000 Hour LED, DLP Projector
reviews.reviewText: simply did not work, LED light not projecting anything, although the fan was heard to work
reviews.title: the device failed and I had to return it

reviews.name: AAXA P2 Jr. Pico Projector, 55 Lumens, Pocket Size, Li-Ion Battery, HDMI, Media Player, 15,000 Hour LED, DLP Projector
reviews.reviewText: Great little kid entertainer. I am surprised how far technology has come and use this guy in my kids room. It is a small dark light controlled room which is perfect for this projector to display their tv shows. The build in speakers arent great. but the kids don't mind. They just want to watch. So I play it at night before they go to bed while I work on the computer.
reviews.title: Awesome kid entertainer!

reviews.name: AAXA P2 Jr. Pico Projector, 55 Lumens, Pocket Size, Li-Ion Battery, HDMI, Media Player, 15,000 Hour LED, DLP Projector
reviews.reviewText:
This product does not come with the Mini HDMI cable and
is difficult to find. Is not user friendly at all. I had to return it
and ended up getting Vivitek 5 Series, very easy. Simply plug
in and project, no gimmicks. I was disappointed.
Annonymous
reviews.title: Not User Friendly at all...
